title: E-Commerce Coordinator
content:
Aimé Leon Dore is looking for an E-Commerce Coordinator to join our team in Queens, New York, reporting directly to the E-Commerce Manager. This position will assist in the day-to-day operations of the online business, specifically in the areas of sample management, catalog maintenance, and operational efficiency.
 
Duties and Responsibilities
Release Management

Manage and maintain site catalogs, including end-to-end ownership of assortment information and product page setup across all platforms
Responsible for execution of all scheduled and ad hoc website updates to support product launches, marketing initiatives, and special projects such as raffles and preorders
Collaborate with internal departments to gather product details, size charts, and assets in a timely manner for product publication
Responsible for staging, testing and executing website updates including imagery, graphics and copy in support of campaigns, projects and weekly refreshes

Sample Management

Manage sample life cycle, including maintaining sample tracker, receiving and organizing all samples, identifying styles missing proper tags, maintaining accurate inventory, and handling sample transfers
Oversee product pull systems and processes for office sample and photoshoot inventory
Create and manage seasonal samples tracker; collaborate with partner teams to ensure tracker reflects current status
Work with Supply Chain Team to transfer samples to archive post-season

Site Merchandising & User Experience

Find insights throughout the customer journey to provide feedback to cross-functional partners including marketing, merchandising, design, and operations
Review quality assurance for desktop and mobile sites, identifying and resolving opportunity areas
Support the planning and delivery of enhancements to support new merchandising and selling strategies
Assist with ad hoc reporting, testing initiatives and special projects

 
Qualifications

2+ years related E-Commerce or Retail experience preferred
Experience with Shopify and/or Klaviyo, a plus
Ability to thrive in a high-volume, rapidly changing environment, with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively
Must be anticipatory and take initiative on task management across departments
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Must be organized and illustrate a keen attention to detail

 
Salary Range: $50,000 - $60,000 Created in 2014, Aimé Leon Dore is a lifestyle, sport and ready-to-wear brand based out of Queens, New York. With a strong focus on simple yet powerful design, we are driven to create timeless work by portraying an aesthetic that is uniquely our own
